headline.main: New York Plan Attacks Habits of Heart Disease

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Health officials in New York State are embarking on a campaign to teach people how to lower their longterm risks of coronary heart disease, the leading cause of death in America.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Health officials in New York State are embarking on a campaign to teach people how to lower their longterm risks of coronary heart disease, the leading cause of death in America.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Not everyone who puts on running shoes plans to enter the New York Marathon; and rare is the calorie-conscious person who doesn't occasionally fall off the wagon and into a bag of french fries. Nonetheless, it's a fact that Americans are taking better care of themselves, and the Federal Centers for Disease Control can prove it.
